contest-event.event-date:
April 5, 2019 D North American Championships (Second Section)
North American Championships (Second Section) 20 Set Test and Own Choice North American Championships north-american-championships-2nd-section
United States of America
Second
Coventry Variations
Embassy Theater, Fort Wayne, IN, USA Programme of between 23 and 36 minutes, including Set Work.
The overall score is weighted as 60% of Set Piece score plus 40% of Own Choice score
1st tiebreaker - band with the highest Set Piece score wins 2nd tiebreaker - band rated higher on the Set Piece by 2 of the 3 adjudicators wins
Sept. 11, 2019, 1:35 p.m. Dec. 5, 2019, 2:16 p.m.
1 Capital City Brass Band Jim Otto Olympus
2 Motor City Brass Band Craig Strain Brass Triumphant
3 Milwaukee Festival Brass Mark A. Taylor Endeavour [Sparke]
4 New England Brass Band Stephen Bulla Concerto Grosso No. 1 [Furber]
5 Upper Canada Brass Rita Arendz Ex Terra Lucem
6 Fillmore Philharmonic Brass Dr. Kevin Holzman Music for a Festival
7 Youth Brass Band of Central Florida Aaron McGarvey Variations on Laudate Dominum
8 Cincinnati Brass Band Jon Noworyta Fire In The Blood
9 River Brass Pat Stuckemeyer The Plantagenets
10 Austin Brass Band John Caputo Kingdom of Dragons
